articles.title: Inside an ER during the coronavirus outbreak - CNN

Watch exclusive access to a Covid-19 hospital in "Inside the ER: The Incredible Fight Against Coronavirus," at 9 p.m. ET and 10 p.m. PT tonight on CNN.
